description: Respiratory Disturbance Index at 3% desat.  Ratio of the count of all apneas (central and obstructive) and hypopneas associated with at least a 3% oxygen desaturation to the total sleep time expressed in hours.
calculation: [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas associated with >= 3% desat) / (hours of sleep)].   rdi3p = 60*(hrembp3 + hrop3 + hnrbp3 + hnrop3 + carbp3 + carop3 + canbp3 + canop3 +oarbp3 +oarop3 + oanbp3 + oanop3) / slpprdp
